page.title: 21Warwick Estate updated
page.content:
Since 1986 most of the estate has disappeared. The Youth club and the bowling green has gone. In 1997 the local school was burned out. Also burned was the local betting office and Working Mens Club. Since 2000 many of the houses have been torn down leaving large areas of grass. The local Area housing updated the houses to a more modern look but the stigma of the area still carries with the name.
Contribution by: Will
